Package space.sunqian.fs.net.http

package space.sunqian.fs.net.http
Provides http utilities and interfaces to request http server with minimal effort, using codes similar to the following: 

 HttpResp resp = HttpKit.request(
     HttpReq.newBuilder()
         .url("http://localhost:" + httpServer.localAddress().getPort())
         .method("GET")
         .header(key, value)
         .header(key, value)
         .build()
     )
 );
or 

 HttpResp resp = HttpCaller.newHttpCaller().request(
     HttpReq.newBuilder()
         .url("http://localhost:" + httpServer.localAddress().getPort())
         .method("GET")
         .header(key, value)
         .header(key, value)
         .build()
     )
 );

Utilities:

  • HttpKit
Core interfaces:
  • HttpCaller
  • HttpReq
  • HttpResp

  • Class
    Description
    HttpCaller
    HttpCaller is a very simple HTTP client interface.
    HttpCaller.Builder
    Builder for HttpCaller.
    HttpKit
    Http utilities.
    HttpNetException
    Exception for http network.
    HttpReq
    Http request info, can be built by HttpReq.newBuilder().
    HttpReq.Body
    Represents the body of the request.
    HttpReq.Body.Type
    Type of request body.
    HttpReq.Builder
    Builder for HttpReq.
    HttpResp
    Http response info.
